entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 80
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS AROUND 80

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
